ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*Outdoor/Indoor Camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 1 Array IR LED, 65 feet IR Range, 560 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, The Array LED deliver high performance, compact and cost-effective solid-state lighting solutions to serve the high-end lighting market, Metal vandal proof & water proof;; 4*Outdoor/Indoor Camera, 1/3" CMOS, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 30 IR LEDs, 82 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & 30FPS D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback, (8 Cameras) 4 Sony CCD 560 TVL Array IR, 4 CMOS 650 TVL 30 IR LEDs, iPhone Android Viewable
